episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch00: Hmm... I simply haven’t got a clue...
Hm?
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Impeccable timing.
I’m in need of your commoner taste buds!

Of all the foods you can find at food stalls, which
is your favorite?
(Say you like grilled rice balls.)
That’s what the stall over there is making, right?
(Say you like spicy fries.)
Interesting... That’s a rather simple dish.
I see... So that’s what commoners like to eat...

Hm? You want to know why I asked for your
opinion on this matter?
Well...I suppose it’d be fine if I told you.

I’ve recently received some feedback that Pasio’s
souvenirs are too expensive—especially the food.

Of course they’re expensive—quality things
naturally come at a higher price!
At least, that’s what I’d usually say...

But Sawyer and Rachel said that I should
consider this issue...

and that one of a king’s duties is to protect the
financial wellbeing of his subjects.

As such, I’ve decided to develop more reasonably
priced products to add to our existing lineup!

I came here to look into what commoners like to
eat...

But I grew up as one destined to be king,
surrounded by the finest things, so I know nothing
about commoners’ tastes!

And even if I came across something suitable for
commoners, I can’t approve it unless it meets MY
standards, too!
...What?

You’re asking if I’ve REALLY never enjoyed the
taste of a food made for commoners?
No, I don’t think I’ve ever—

Oh, wait! Come to think of it, I do remember one
time...
Bwahahahaha! That’s it! I’ve got it!

Well done, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Thank you
for the help!

Days later, Lear sent [Name:PlayerNickname ]
an invitation to sample a product he developed
that was catered to commoners...
What he ended up serving was...instant ramen!
I’ve finally created a sample that I’m happy with!

I trust your taste buds, and I’m counting on you
to give an honest opinion! Tell me how it tastes!
(Tell him it’s delicious.)
Heh. Excellent to hear! A satisfactory answer.
(Tell him it has a comforting flavor.)
I see! That’s exactly what I was going for!
It’s a relief hearing that from you.

An event from my childhood is what sparked my
inspiration for this product.

Back when I was separated from Sawyer and
Rachel and under a strict educational regimen...

I had to go without supper one night, as a
punishment.

But Hoopa got into a storage room and brought
me some instant ramen from the emergency food
reserves.
We shared that instant ramen...

And although it was quite simple as far as taste
goes, I was hungry, and it was sublime.
I’m trying to recreate that flavor with this product.

Your impromptu question is what made this
product a reality, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

Ever since we first met, even though I didn’t like
everything about you, you’ve never said anything
that was untrue.
That’s how I knew I could trust your opinion...

And sure enough, I was not mistaken in placing
my trust in you this time, either.
You have many qualities that I do not.
And so, I just wanted to say...

It would...help me a lot if we could continue to
work together like this in the future.
